title: Citrix, Spotify, Knightscope, Tesla: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Citrix is nearing a deal to be taken private; Spotify made public its content policies
body:
Stock futures are wavering, with major indexes poised to close January with heavy losses. Here’s what we’re watching in Monday’s trading:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
